wikipedia_page.main: Sidney Ernest Rowland Castle (12 March 1892 in Basingstoke – 27 January 1978) was an English professional footballer who played for Basingstoke Town, Thornycroft Athletic, Guildford United, Tottenham Hotspur, Charlton Athletic, Chelsea.

response: * Sid Castle, former professional footballer for Tottenham Hotspur, Charlton Athletic and Chelsea, and former manager of Ajax
